mapper.select: SELECT MASTER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_STAT = '1' -- 처리상태 : 미요청 AND PL_REG_STAT = '1' -- 모집인상태 : 승인전 AND TO_CHAR(REG_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 month', 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT USER_SEQ FROM tb_lc_users WHERE (last_login_dt + '3 month'::interval) <= now()
SELECT MASTER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_STAT = '9' AND PL_REGIST_NO IS NULL
SELECT * FROM tb_lc_schedule WHERE schedule_name = #{scheduleName} AND status in ('1', '3') AND reg_time > (now() - interval'30 minute')

select MASTER_SEQ , CON_NUM , COM_CODE , FN_CELLPHONE(PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE , PL_CLASS , PL_PRODUCT , PL_REG_STAT , PL_STAT , PL_REGIST_NO , CI , PL_M_NAME , PL_M_Z_ID , COM_CONT_DATE , PL_MERCHANT_NAME , PL_CEO_NAME , PL_MERCHANT_NO , PL_BUSINESS_NO , COMP_PHONE_NO , PL_HIST_CD , COM_HAEJI_DATE , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') as CRE_HAEJI_DATE from tb_lc_mas01 where PL_STAT = '4' and com_haeji_date <= TO_CHAR(NOW() - INTERVAL '4 day', 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lc_schedule WHERE schedule_name = #{scheduleName} AND status != '2' AND property02 = #{property02}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_lc_users_indv_req SET stat = '2' , comp_date = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , upd_seq = #{regSeq} , upd_timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_indv_req_seq = #{userIndvReqSeq}
UPDATE tb_lc_users_corp_req SET stat = '2' , comp_date = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , upd_seq = #{regSeq} , upd_timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_corp_req_seq = #{userCorpReqSeq}
mapper.select: select name as scheduleName from shedlock

select
tlsh.* from tb_lc_schedule_hist tlsh where req_cnt > 0 and req_cnt != success_cnt and start_time > (now() - interval'3 day')

SELECT schedule_seq , schedule_name , param , case when status = '1' then '30분 초과' when status = '3' then '오류' else '성공' end status , reg_time , start_time , error FROM tb_lc_schedule WHERE schedule_name = #{scheduleName} AND (status in ('3') OR (status in ('1') AND reg_time < (now() - interval'30 minute')))
mapper.update: update tb_lc_schedule set reg_time = now() , status = '1' , param = #{param} , upd_timestamp = NOW() , upd_seq = 0 where schedule_seq = #{scheduleSeq}
